data.title: SSPHS: List of members' publications
data.text:
LIST OF DISSERTATIONS AND BOOKS BY MEMBERS OF SSPHS

Dissertations and books by current members of SSPHS, based on the lists first published in the Bulletin of the Society for Spanish and Portuguese Historical Studies, Vol.XXVIII, #3 (2003), pp. 22-50, and Vol. XXIX, #1 (2004), 35-42. Many thanks to Connie Mathers for preparing those lists.

Dissertations are printed in all-capital letters.

The published lists included only North American members; overseas members are invited to submit the titles of dissertations and books for addition to the list. Any current members who wish to update their entries should send additions and corrections to demilio@shell.cas.usf.edu.
